name: Pfizer Inc.
headquarters: New York, New York, United States
summary: Pfizer Inc. is a leading American multinational pharmaceutical and biotechnology corporation, founded in 1849 and headquartered in New York City. The company develops and manufactures medicines and vaccines across key therapeutic areas, including immunology, oncology, cardiology, endocrinology, and neurology. Pfizer is recognized globally for its innovation, including the development of the Pfizer–BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine, and is consistently ranked among the world’s largest pharmaceutical companies.
